title: I hope riot reveals Deadeye tomorrow.....
body:
I could be wrong, but I have a strong feeling that we will finally get to see what Deadeye looks like tomorrow. I was hoping today but it has been all quiet on the Riot News front. The anticipation is growing......
http://memecrunch.com/meme/1J8J7/it-s-the-deep-breath-before-the-plunge/image.png

replies.body: I assume that they will reveal it tomorrow seeing as the Vi Teaser is still live and will be until tomorrow at midnight.
All the teasers are live though right?

Indeed. In actuallity, Zed's teaser was released on the 26th of December, Sona's on the 28th, Garen's on the 30th, Vi's on the 1st of January, and all four teasers were re-added yesterday, which was the 3rd. Tomorrow would keep with this two day pattern.
Oh god...IT'S A TWO HIT PASSIVE.

Got to upvote xD

Btw I believe the reveal will be the 7th as

Zed => 3
Sona => 4
Garen =>5
VI => 6 (Roman number)
Deadeye => 7

You want us to wait until THURSDAY?!?!?!

ARE YOU MAD?!?!?!
Spoiler: Deadeye shoots Master Yi next to throw everyone off his trail of the number theory.
Master Yi's Goggles have seven lenses.
Master Yi's Alpha Strike hits 4 targets.

Master Yi's Kill Count is 57










GG
Master Yi targeted Rammus. Rammus activated Defensive Ball Curl, and used Taunt. Then destroyed Master Yi with Tremors.
Rammus is deadeye confirmed.
Hey, no spoilers!

http://www.carid.com/ic/jks/spoilers/jks-custom-style-rear-spoiler_8.jpg

http://ih0.redbubble.net/image.135723564.9466/flat,1000x1000,075,f.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Riot ShadowStorm,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=abgRxy0q,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-05T20:28:43.353+0000)
>
> Hey, no spoilers!

Ok. Yeah.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot ShadowStorm,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=abgRxy0q,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-05T20:28:43.353+0000)
>
> Hey, no spoilers!

Yes spoilers!
Rammus taunts garen, vi, and zed, and they all destroy their own health bars.
Because that's his secret lore, the things Rito never tells us
Master Yi Is Rammus Confirmed
The 7th day of the week is Sunday...
the 7th. januray 7th. go look at a calender.
XD
Sunday is the first day of the week...
Obviously, his lore enemy is confirmed: {{champion:62}}
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/u2RaxRHfVlA/maxresdefault.jpg
somehow i feel like riot is screwing with everybody, big time, and deadeye is actually a reworked taric. after all, each of the 4 champions teasers are quite... fabulous.
{{champion:44}} Outrageous!
TRULY

it is actually a {{champion:83}} re-work.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I expect a champion. Nothing less
wouldn't a Yorick rework be essentially the same as a new champ though?

my dad died of anxiety wanting to know what the heck were these teasers 

(jk bout him wanting to know it, but he had an Infarction in 01/01/2016 ='/) 

rip dad

So sorry for your loss mate, prayers and thoughts are with you and your family. 

Seems like you are doing ok though? Was not expecting a joke tbh.

Thank you very much

i'm feeling a bit better, things like playing lol (aram only) and visiting the boards helps me to distract and calm down

still cant stop thinking bout him neither sleep without pharm. drugs

Glad you are feeling somewhat better :D

I love ARAM! Main that mode almost exclusively :P let me know if you ever want to play, so down. 

That's awful and I hope that changes for you soon, but it sounds like you have a great method to help you cope in the meantime. 

Just don't forget that we are all here to support you through this :D

I believe if we didn't see the champion reveal today,
we will need to wait until next week ,since new patch for live and new pbe cycle start in next week.

BTW, I guess the new champ is an adc because 

Top: {{champion:86}}   JG:{{champion:254}}   Mid:{{champion:238}}    ADC :?   SUP:{{champion:37}} 

A new adc with some global/aura  passive?

But I don't want to wait til next week......
http://memesvault.com/wp-content/uploads/Sad-Frog-Meme-Smiling-09.jpg
Well, Snowdown officialy ends on the 7th with legend of the poro king going down on the 7th so... i wouldn't expect anything before then

That moment when you start to get the feeling that you just might have to wait a couple more days....
http://memesvault.com/wp-content/uploads/Sad-Crying-Meme-Face-05.jpg
Yeah we might find out next Tuesday. But not this week as the PBE is still on 6.1 and Deadeye will be in 6.2.
The dang icons got us all excited.

Yeah, they are not usually reveled until near the end of the current PBE cycle, and that isn't for another week.
 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Well today has been Riot's day of adjustment; they're getting back in to the work flow after a two week break. While many of us (including myself) were hopeful for something today, the likelihood was always  that today was gonna be quiet on the news front. Here's hoping for tomorrow!

Good news - Deadeye might be revealed tomorrow!
Bad news - Riot is going to disable Vi, Garen, Sona, and Zed to show they're dead :D 

... They did it with Gangplank, why not them too? ... Oh boy.
How is that a bad thing?

Not really "bad" but it does kind of blow. I main Vi, so depending how long they'll disable her for ... I won't be able to play her.

That goes for all the Zed mains, Garen mains, and Sona mains. I remember people disliking the fact Gangplank was disabled even if it didn't seem that long of a period. Still, just my thoughts on the subject lol.

Honestly, I dont  believe they will "Kill disable" the champions featured in these teasers as when they disabled GP for being "Dead" they got such an earful from the community and in these pictures, Deadeye is not killing these champions, these are all illusions to things about the champion. Vi is a good example of this, I mean in her picture shes not even being attacked the only thing thats happening is that her fist were shot off.
Well, he probably won't be until patch cycle 6.2 on PBE which a rioter said will be next week. So he probably won't be revealed until next week
If they make him a top lane ADC I might just quit
I hope he's a mid lane ranged assassin champ with a sniper who doesn't do sustained damage but long range bursts like a real sniper.
